mailSubject: Updated Checklist for J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC
mailBody:
Dear Surbhi,

I hope this message finds you well.

Thank you for providing the updated checklist for J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC. I have reviewed the checklist and incorporated the supplementary information regarding the PEP screening data. Below is a summary of the updated checklist:

### Updated Checklist Summary
| Checklist Item                       | Status    | Comment                                                                                     |
|--------------------------------------|-----------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Company Address Proof                | Validated | Address proof is available with utility bill issued by London City Utilities.               |
| Company Annual Account and Ellipro Survey | Validated | Annual accounts and Ellipro scores for 2020–2022 are available.                             |
| Company Bank and Postal Details      | Validated | Bank and postal details are verified with available bank account and SWIFT code.           |
| Company Directorship                 | Missing   | Organization does not release directorship information in its annual report.                |
| Company Tax Documentation            | Missing   | Organization does not include details about tax documentation in its annual report.         |
| Company Regulatory Compliance         | Missing   | Organization does not release information about regulatory compliance in its annual report. |
| Company Business Scope               | Validated | Detailed business scope information is available, highlighting leadership roles and services.|
| Company PEP Screening                | Missing   | PEP screening data indicates risks from individuals associated with the company.            |
| Company Revenue Details              | Validated | Total net revenue of 158.1 billion dollars for the year ended December 31, 2023 is reported.|
| Company Market Capitalization Details | Validated | Market capitalization as of December 31, 2023 is reported as 489,320 million dollars.     |

The detailed checklist has been saved in the JSON format for your reference.

If you have any further questions or need additional information, please do not hesitate to reach out.

Best regards,  
Shubham Sahay  
shubham.sahay@capgemini.com
